articles.title: Mann Ki Baat LIVE Updates: PM Modi to Address Nation Shortly Amid Coronavirus Outbreak
articles.description: Mann Ki Baat live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will address the nation at 11am today through his monthly programme ‘Mann ki Baat’ amid the coronavirus pandemic in the country.
articles.content: The death toll due to Covid-19 in the country has risen to 779 and the number of cases to 24,942, according to data from the Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. Even as fresh cases were detected in Maharashtra, Uttar Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh and Delhi… [+891 chars]

articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: India reports 1,990 new Covid-19 cases, 49 deaths in 24 hours
articles.description: Maharashtra and Gujarat, where the coronavirus outbreak has been growing at a much faster pace recently than the rest of the country, had the most number of cases.
articles.content:
India reported 1,990 new cases of the coronavirus disease (Covid-19), 561 more than Saturday, and 49 deaths in the past 24 hours, the Union health ministry said on Sunday morning.
The ministry’s Covid-19 dashboard showed 19,868 people have been infected by S… [+2007 chars]

articles.author: News18
articles.title: Global Coronavirus Death Toll Crosses 2 Lakh, Positive Cases to Soon Touch 30 Lakh: Report
articles.description: The United States had reported more than 52,400 deaths as of Saturday morning, while Italy, Spain and France have reported between 22,000-26,000 fatalities each.
articles.content:
Global deaths linked to the coronavirus passed 2,00,000 on Saturday, while confirmed cases are expected to hit three million (or 30 lakh) in the coming days, according to a Reuters tally.
More than half of the fatalities have been reported in the United Stat… [+1565 chars]

articles.description: Coronavirus Outbreak LIVE Updates: Maharashtra on Saturday reported 811 new confirmed COVID-19 cases, a single-day record for the state. The total number of positive cases in the state are now 7,628 and the toll rose by 22 to reach 323, a Health department st…

articles.title: Amitabh Bachchan Jokes About Coronavirus And Netizens Aren't Happy - News18
articles.description: Amitabh Bachchan took to Twitter to tell his fans that a bat had entered his room at his residence Jalsa. He joked how the coronavirus is trailing him.

articles.description: The large ozone hole observed last month in the Arctic, located above the north polar circle of the world, was completely closed according to the statement made by scientists. Scientists have explained that this phenomenon is not related to the coronavirus. T…

articles.title: Coronavirus | After Indore, three nearby districts see surge in deaths - The Hindu
articles.description: They account for 85% of fatalities in Madhya Pradesh
articles.content:
Three neighbouring districts of Indore which reported the most COVID-19 cases in Madhya Pradesh are fast emerging as the new hotspots. Three out of four patients to die of the illness in the State come from the four districts combined.

articles.description: Karan Johar has apologised for his ‘insensitive’ social media posts during the coronavirus pandemic, after watching a ‘hard-hitting’ video.
articles.content:
Filmmaker Karan Johar has apologised for his social media posts during the coronavirus lockdown, after watching a video which sarcastically pointed out that the real heroes are the celebrities.
